title: Been here since season 1
body: been here since season one and i still suck balls , any tips?{{champion:33}}

replies.body:
Nothing, honestly if you have been here that long and you still suck, there is nothing we can do to help you, you are just destined to be yet another player who plays this game for fun.

I have been here since Season 2 and am a player who is good enough in the solo queue to just have some fun without being a burden on myself or my team, that is a good place to be for a casual gamer.

Really, you need to think why you suck.

Is it that you can't remember what all the champions do? I don't blame you, there are 128 of them.

Is it that you can't click on the correct target to get your spells to work? I don't blame you, that is a major issue with MoBA games, just get an AOE champion and hope for the best.

Is it that you can't look at the map and screen in conjunction and keep dying to ganks? Than choose someone who can farm with ease and not have to be in your face.

There are options, but it simply limits the champions you can choose. Although, choosing only a handful of them will determine your weakness and strengths and allow you to get good enough with a couple of them that you don't think anymore allowing you to focus more on the enemy and the map than your own decisions.
Dont multitask. Cant play lol with your mouth full.
added u in game if u want some coaching or something.
